name: Mysterious Object
description: An object of unknown origin and purpose.

name: Ancient Coin
description: A coin from a long-lost civilization, possibly worth a fortune.

name: Dusty Book
description: A book with strange symbols on its cover, written in an unknown language.

name: Glowing Crystal
description: A crystal that emits a soft, pulsating light. It feels cool to the touch.

name: Rusty Locket
description: An old locket that seems to be stuck shut. You wonder what secrets it holds.

name: Peculiar Feather
description: A feather that shimmers with all colors of the rainbow. It's unnaturally light.

name: Broken Clockwork
description: A small mechanical device with gears and springs. It's not working, but looks fixable.

name: Enchanted Mirror
description: A hand mirror that occasionally shows fleeting images that aren't there.
